entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
